EmailTemplate.name: ES-2017-09-21-CAE-NewYork-092817-3.ES-2017-09-21-CAE-NewYork-092817-3
EmailTemplate.subject: You're Invited: Turbonomic Community Happy Hour and Golf
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://turbonomic.com/nyc-community-appreciation-chelsea-piers/]]> Hi {{lead.First Name:default=there}},
Next week, on Thursday, September 28th, the New York City Turbonomic and Presidio Community is looking forward to an evening at The Golf Club at Chelsea Pier for a happy hour and of course, golf. Together, we will brush up on our skills with a help of a golf pro and casually learn about our product roadmap from current Turbonomic and Presidio customers. Will you join me and your technology peers on September 28th? The Golf Club at Chelsea Piers <[[https://turbonomic.com/nyc-community-appreciation-chelsea-piers/]]>
59 Chelsea Piers, New York, NY 10011 Thursday, September 28th 5:30pm
Reserve your spot today <[[https://turbonomic.com/nyc-community-appreciation-chelsea-piers/]]>!
I hope to see you there,
Cody Carlson Regional Sales Director, Northeast Turbonomic
